hero.title: Work smarter with AI tools in one place.
hero.subtitle: PrimeTools combines PDF, text, emoji and social media caption tools in one clean and fast interface. The free version is available now – the premium version is coming soon.
hero.note: No installation required. Works on desktop and mobile devices. No account needed for the free tools.

features.title: Why PrimeTools?
features.item1Text: Use all tools directly in your browser – no registration, no installation.
features.item2Text: We only process your files for the selected action and do not store them permanently.
features.item3Text: New tools and features are added step by step.

pdfPage.title: PDF tools
pdfPage.subtitle: Upload one or more files and choose an action. The features are being expanded step by step.
pdfPage.uploadLabel: Drag files here or click to select
pdfPage.uploadHint: Supported are e.g. PDF, images and Office files. Actual processing is still being developed.
pdfPage.compressDescription: Make PDFs smaller so they are easier to upload or send.
pdfPage.mergeDescription: Combine multiple PDFs into a single document.
pdfPage.splitDescription: Save specific page ranges from a PDF as a new file.
pdfPage.toPdfDescription: Convert images or Office documents into PDF files.
pdfPage.toJpgDescription: Export individual PDF pages as JPG images.
pdfPage.rotateDescription: Quickly fix PDF pages that are rotated the wrong way.
pdfPage.extractDescription: Each page of the PDF is saved as a separate file.
pdfPage.splitInputHint: Use commas for single pages and dashes for ranges (example: 1-3,5,7-9).
pdfPage.rotateDescription: Quickly fix PDF pages that are rotated the wrong way.
pdfPage.comingSoon: This feature is currently being developed and will be available soon.
pdfPage.simpleCompressionNote: Note: The current compression is a simple basic optimisation. The file size may only be reduced slightly. A stronger compression mode will be added later.
